verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Praise יָ֨הּ ׀ <WH3050> ye the LORD שִׁ֣ירוּ <WH7891> Sing לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> unto the LORD שִׁ֣יר <WH7892> song חָדָ֑שׁ <WH2319> a new תְּ֝הִלָּת֗וֹ <WH8416> [and] his praise בִּקְהַ֥ל <WH6951> in the congregation חֲסִידִֽים׃ <WH2623> of saints

יִשְׂמַ֣ח <WH8055> rejoice יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Let Israel בְּעֹשָׂ֑יו <WH6213> in him that made בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> him let the children צִ֝יּ֗וֹן <WH6726> of Zion יָגִ֥ילוּ <WH1523> be joyful בְמַלְכָּֽם׃ <WH4428> in their King

יְהַֽלְל֣וּ <WH1984> Let them praise שְׁמ֣וֹ <WH8034> his name בְמָח֑וֹל <WH4234> in the dance בְּתֹ֥ף <WH8596> unto him with the timbrel וְ֝כִנּ֗וֹר <WH3658> and harp יְזַמְּרוּ־ <WH2167> let them sing praises לֽוֹ׃

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רוֹצֶ֣ה <WH7521> taketh pleasure יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> For the LORD בְּעַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> in his people יְפָאֵ֥ר <WH6286> he will beautify עֲ֝נָוִ֗ים <WH6035> the meek בִּישׁוּעָֽה׃ <WH3444> with salvation
יַעְלְז֣וּ <WH5937> be joyful חֲסִידִ֣ים <WH2623> Let the saints בְּכָב֑וֹד <WH3519> in glory יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ <WH7442> let them sing aloud עַל־ <WH5921> on מִשְׁכְּבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH4904> upon their beds

רוֹמְמ֣וֹת <WH7319> [Let] the high אֵ֭ל <WH410> [praises] of God בִּגְרוֹנָ֑ם <WH1627> [be] in their mouth וְחֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> sword פִּֽיפִיּ֣וֹת <WH6374> and a twoedged בְּיָדָֽם׃ <WH3027> in their hand
לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> To execute נְ֭קָמָה <WH5360> vengeance בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> upon the heathen תּֽ֝וֹכֵחֹ֗ת <WH8433> [and] punishments בַּל־ <WH1077> lest אֻמִּֽים׃ <WH3816> upon the people
לֶאְסֹ֣ר <WH631> To bind מַלְכֵיהֶ֣ם <WH4428> their kings בְּזִקִּ֑ים <WH2131> with chains וְ֝נִכְבְּדֵיהֶ֗ם <WH3513> and their nobles בְּכַבְלֵ֥י <WH3525> with fetters בַרְזֶֽל׃ <WH1270> of iron

לַעֲשׂ֤וֹת <WH6213> To execute בָּהֶ֨ם ׀ מִשְׁפָּ֬ט <WH4941> upon them the judgment כָּת֗וּב <WH3789> written הָדָ֣ר <WH1926> this honour ה֭וּא <WH1931> This לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all חֲסִידָ֗יו <WH2623> have all his saints הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD
